name: Food connector
description:
This is small game created for jam - https://itch.io/jam/scorespace-x-alakajam. Game offer only local multiplayer competition (on the same machine). Few worlds about controlls:

You can control by keyboard or joistic. But not every jostick will have correct axis (tested on xbox360 joistick). For now game don't have options for controls change.

Player 1 control:
wsad or 1 joistic left analog

Player 2 control:
ikjl or 2 joistic left analog

Player 3 control:
up arrow, down arrow, left arrow, right arrow or 3 joistic left analog

Player 4 control:
numpad 8, numpad 5, numpad 4, numpad 6 (noom look must be turn on lighting on keyboard) or 4 joistic left analog
